subject: The 27th STePS ---- Last Chance to Register for STePS â€” Free Buffet Dinner Included! --- Closes 5th November
body:
Dear Students, 
 We'd like to invite you to the The 27th STePS (SoC Term Project Showcase) held on 12-Nov-2025 [Physical Event], the largest developer centric event of the school. 

 Registration opens today!  https://bit.ly/steps27r 

 STePS has three goals:
E3 :  Education through self-directed peer-learning by facilitating an environment to freely think, create, criticise and reflect with strong support from educational institutes, industry and government agencies; Employment through modern flipped career fair where students demonstrate their skills live to the talent acquisition departments to assess; and Entrepreneurship through collaboration with Industry and Investors.
From cool new Healthcare Innovations and Game  projects ðŸŽ® to exciting AI/ML enterprise appsðŸ“±, thereâ€™s lots to see and and learn from peers. ðŸ˜‰Register now to view (and vote!) for your favourite projects at https://uvents.nus.edu.sg/event/27th-steps.   

(NB:- Last date for registration of Standard Tickets with Buffet Dinner: 05 Nov 2025) 
You can use your registration ID as voter TOKEN to Vote for the best projects.
